content:
From our meeting today I opened up https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/10931 about binary compatibility (aka glibc versioning) and https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/10930 about improving reliability (aka prebuilt docker images)

Wasmtime's OS binary version support policy · Issue #10931 · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Currently we have a number of release binaries produced as part of Wasmtime's CI and are intended to be the default way to run/use Wasmtime in a wide variety of scenarios. As a result we try to mak...
Improve reliabilty of `apt-get install` in CI · Issue #10930 · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Discussed in today's Wasmtime meeting I'd like to open this issue on the topic of improving reliability of apt-get install in CI. The background here is: We build release binaries for Wasmtime in o...
